description:
Segawa Satoshi was an elderly scholar living with his wife, http://anidb.net/ch149069 [Takako], at the house later dubbed "Ghost Mansion" - the same one that http://anidb.net/ch149066 [Toono Sawako] and her http://anidb.net/ch149067 [husband] moved into later. He died suddenly probably due to becoming overexcited after having found what he called a "treasure" at his house.
The "treasure" turned out to be old writings hidden inside the sliding doors.
name: Segawa Satoshi
